summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to Brittany at epllc.com, referencing a meeting with an unnamed individual who provided emails about encounters with Jeffrey Epstein and requesting coordination to obtain those documents.

events.title: Meeting in California about Epstein emails
events.description: An unnamed individual met with the Assistant U.S. Attorney in California and mentioned providing emails about encounters with Jeffrey Epstein to Brittany.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY is actively seeking emails related to encounters with Jeffrey Epstein as of September 2019.
An unnamed individual had previously provided a batch of such emails to Brittany at epllc.com.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative coordination between federal prosecutors and individuals holding relevant documentary evidence.
